N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-11.4 - Construction of miniature boilers under power boiler rules

State Regulations
(a) The construction of miniature boilers, except where otherwise specified, shall conform to that required for power
boilers. The factor of safety and method of computing the maximum allowable
working pressure shall be the same as for power boilers. (b) Miniature boilers constructed by fusion
welding in accordance with all the requirements of the ASME Code are not
required to have the welded joints radiographed or post weld heat
treated. (c) Electric boilers shall
be constructed and stamped in accordance with the ASME Code. Notes
